title: Speech & Language Therapy
description: Our speech therapy program focuses on helping children express themselves clearly and confidently. We create fun, engaging sessions to build vital communication skills.

title: Occupational Therapy (OT)
description: Occupational therapy helps children gain independence in their daily lives. We focus on fine motor skills, sensory processing, and self-care routines.

title: Special Education
description: Our special educators work one-on-one with children to bridge learning gaps using individualized strategies that move beyond standard classroom methods.

title: School Readiness Program
description: A specialized program designed to prepare young children for the transition to formal schooling, focusing on social, emotional, and foundational academic skills.
